#summary Building wikinet from sources

= Requirements =
  # jdk 1.6 (or later)
  # maven
  # ant
  # activemq (optional)
  # mysql (optional)
  

= Steps =

  # Checkout sources<br>svn checkout http://wikinet.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ wikinet
  # Change working directory to wikinet<br>cd wikinet
  # Clean up build directories if any<br>mvn clean
  # Build project<br>mvn package<br>NOTE: if you don't have activemq running or you just want to skip tests use "mvn package -Dmaven.test.skip=true" instead. Otherwise you should create "wikinet_dev" database using mysql like this:<br>mysql --user=root --password=<br>CREATE DATABASE wikinet_dev CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin;
  # Assemble modules and create wikinet zip-archive<br>ant

Now you should get wikinet.zip in wikinet/target directory.
